# addPlayer(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds a player to the session.

## Declaration

```swift
func addPlayer(_ player: AVPlayer)
```

## Parameters

- **player**: The player instance to add to the session.

## Managing players

- **players**: The array of players associated with the session.
- **removePlayer(_:)**: Removes a player from the session.

items.description: The array of players associated with the session.
